items.sentence: Tom was starting to feel a little uncomfortable.
Tom was surprised when he saw Mary at the party.
Tom was tasked with gathering wood for the fire.
Tom was unwilling to do what I wanted him to do.
Tom was waiting for Mary outside the restaurant.
She thinks about him when she\'s feeling lonely.
We hope Tom sticks around for a couple of weeks.
We were expecting something different to happen.
What I want him to do now is to paint the fence.
Tom asked Mary several times to open the window.
